These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

incident_updates.body: Cloudflare is experiencing delays in updating customer settings. This includes general changes to Cloudflare settings, Firewall, DNS, Access, and SSL certificate deployment. incidents.name: Connectivity delays and increased 4xx/5xx HTTP Errors affecting Chennai Region

incident_updates.body:
Please be advised about connectivity delays and increased 4xx/5xx HTTP Errors.
The issue affected Cloudflare customers in Chennai Region between 12:10 and 12:35 UTC
This is now resolved.

incidents.name: Incorrect email notification regarding subscription cancellation

incident_updates.body: Some customers may have incorrectly received an email notification stating their Cloudflare subscription has been cancelled or downgraded.  Please ignore this email if no changes are expected.

incidents.name: Delayed Custom Hostname verification for SSL for SaaS Customers

incident_updates.body: Custom Hostname verification for SSL for SaaS customers were delayed, and some edge certificate products like Total TLS or Universal SSL for partial zones were delayed issuing certificates between 2024-02-14 20:29 and 2024-02-14 21:05 UTC.
This incident has been resolved.

incidents.name: Cloudflare Dashboard and Cloudflare API service issues

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related APIs. Some customers might see increased errors in the Cloudflare Dashboard Analytics. 

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using the Dashboard / Cloudflare APIs are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.
